name: run-node-app
description: - This repositiory is a simple web application that renders a series of articles along with info about the author and comments in React App using given sample.json - Initially it loads first five articles from data and pagination is added to view other articles so that it renders seamlessly - Each article will render `Show Comments (<no. of comments>)` action.  - Initially comments are hidden for each Comments - First three comments of each arcticle will be shown on click of `Show Comment` action of the particular Article. And Comments of other Articles will be hidden - If Comments length are more than three, then `Show More` action will appear.  - And next three comment will be rendered on click of `Show More` - On click of `Show More`, `Show Less` action will appear, to show less comments on click of the action

scripts.start: cd server && npm install && npm run start
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
